name: Get Your Head Around These! 4 Quiz | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
I begin and end with the letter 'e'
Have eight letters, but just one letter within me.
questions.explanation:
envelope.

	There's one letter in an envelope.

questions.text:
I'm there in darkness, but not alight
Can be seen in daytime, but I'm missing by night 
I'm there in the shadows, but not in sight.
questions.correct: d & the letter d & a d & letter d
questions.explanation: d & the letter d & a d & letter d.

questions.text:
Look at me one way and I'm heavy, I weigh a lot. 
But turn me around and you'll find that I'm not.

Which of these letters is the odd-one-out? 
B C D J K L W X Z 
It's NOT sequential!
(Read the hint)
questions.explanation:
W.

	The answer is 'W' because it is the only letter with three syllables.

questions.text:
I'm a five letter word, yet it sounds strange to say 
Six still remains when you take two letters away!
questions.correct: sixty & Sioux & salix & silex & sixes & sixth & sixer & lasix & exits & exist & fixes & taxis
questions.explanation:
sixty & Sioux & salix & silex & sixes & sixth & sixer & lasix & exits & exist & fixes & taxis.

	Remove the two unwanted letters to leave the word 'six'- eg. 'sixty', remove two letters to leave six(ty).

questions.text:
I can be driven, yet have no wheels or feet 
Can also be sliced, yet remain complete.
(Read the hint)
questions.correct: golf ball & cricket ball & a football & a ball & a baseball & tennis ball & ball & golf club & ball & football & baseball & base ball &puck&hockey puck
questions.explanation: golf ball & cricket ball & a football & a ball & a baseball & tennis ball & ball & golf club & ball & football & baseball & base ball &puck&hockey puck.

questions.text:
Which letter comes next in this series? 
W-L-C-N-I-T-?
questions.explanation:
S.

	W-hich L-etter C-omes N-ext I-n T-his S-eriesThey are the initial letters of the words in the sentence.

questions.text:
The sound of humour, happiness, joy, thrilled
Now add an 's' and it becomes carnage, massacred, killed.
What have I become?
questions.explanation:
slaughter.

	The first line gives you laughter - add an 's' it becomes s+laughter. (Editor's note: Please do not send correction notes saying the answer is "laughter". The hint makes it clear that the question is "what does (laughter) become?" Thank you.)

questions.text: Which of these words is the odd one out (it has nothing to do with the sound of the words)?
questions.explanation:
Creator.

	RECOUNT - TROUNCE - COUNTERThe other three words are anagrams of each other.

questions.text:
Lived in reverse, who or what could I be? 
The incarnation of wickedness and evil - yes that's me!
